title: How I Discovered a Critical Vulnerability in a Leading UK Retail Giant’s System
content: In the realm of cybersecurity, the discovery of vulnerabilities is a critical aspect of enhancing system security and protecting sensitive data. My recent exploration into the digital infrastructure of a major UK retail chain, which I will refer to as “redacted.com” for confidentiality, led to an intriguing and significant discovery...

title: Node — Eval
content: The challenge has a success rate of 1% at the time of writing this mini-walkthrough, so I decided to write this to share my research. To succeed in this challenge, you must first trigger the inputs to see how the application works...
